title: Good job on new position selection icons
body:
http://i.imgur.com/BUST9FQ.png

Just wanted to say that the new position selection icons in champion select are now much nicer: clean, stylish and easy to read.
Nice job, Riot!

replies.body: Did you make them?? 'Cause they do look pretty great.
I did not, but I'll make sure to pass your comments to the team! And yeah, I think they are great too!

They do look nice, but I feel the contrast between the highlighted lane and the other lanes is too low and it's less clear at a glance which lane is selected than before. Maybe a tiny adjustment to the contrast could be made? Just make the inactive lanes very slightly darker.
after this last patch, they are far better than before but still not there. They look a little too simple too.
I found them a bit too simplistic. I know this patch is all about a cleaner and spread-out look, ut I think the previous one - more flashy and detailed - still feels more like the MOBA I love.
Yeah I'm very happy with them too, the client is looking much better every and every patch
